response.overview: Naomi lives with her older brother Shingo, who has a developmental disorder and Tourette's syndrome, and their father. There’s constant conflict between Shingo and their father, and Naomi often struggles at her part-time job, but she lives each day with her usual cheerful spirit, watching over her brother with care. However, one day, something she says at the park unintentionally hurts Shingo... Despite the challenges they face, this humorous story portrays the siblings' lives, overflowing with their rich and unique personalities.
response.title: 空回りする直美
